cards.title: Warsaw Fog
cards.description: The know Polish city has some skyscrappers, but the old town is the kingdom treasure.
cards.text: The know Polish city has some skyscrappers, but the old town is the kingdom treasure. From around the world tourist travel around Poland overviewing the magnitude and the beauty inside the country.

cards.title: Zenith Fog
cards.description: Known as the cold city, Zenith has some beautiful gothic arquitecture from the old days.
cards.text: Known as the cold city, Zenith has some beautiful gothic arquitecture from the old days. A football loving city, a majestic passion around everyone when is match day, the cold cant stand such love.

cards.title: Dubai Fog
cards.description: Paradise, what else to call to this futuristic city full of innovation and a creative identity.
cards.text: Paradise, what else to call to this futuristic city full of innovation and a creative identity. The Arabic culture is still there, yet the ammount of money involved in this country makes it richer than the average arabic country, well thanks to petrol.
